Flappy Owl

Game Discription

Welcome to, Flappy Owl! The internest best game. The goal of the game is fly to the end using your owl character. But the game is not that simple, you will have to navigate through diffrent obstacles. Be extra carefull for moving obstacles. Make sure to stay away of the obstacles as if you hit them your owl will die. You will know you have won when you have reached the gold coin at the end of the level.

Game rules

Flappy Owl's rules are relativley simple. FIrst of all the commands, to make your Owl fly higher, click the up arrow or W key, whatever you prefer. But remember that your owl will be constantly falling so make sure he stays in the air. If the game is too easy click H to activate hard mode. This will add a moving obstacle to make the game harder. Be carefull because if yo hit an obstacle you will lose and your owl will die. Be carefull and GOOD LUCK!

About us
In this project I have learned a lot. The easiest part was CSS as I felt very comfortable and it came easily. Then the HTML was harder but still I could go back to code illusions and find the anwsers. The hardest part was definetley the java. I had not learned everything about sprites and that was very difficult. What made it a lot easier was p5 play and it helped a lot. It really made me expand my knowledge of coding and im very glad that I learned all these new things.
